originalText.text: The best of a not so pleasant experience.  The doctor is professional, reassuring, thorough and caring.  His staff kind and reassuring.  You are able to have the procedure performed in his office.  I found the whole experience better than expected.  I can't say enough nice things about the doctor.

originalText.text:
Dr. Haroutiounian and his staff are a dying bread ~ They are personable, respectful, helpful and prompt.
You will NEVER find another experience; from scheduling the appointment, to meeting them, to saying goodbye, that you will find as pleasurable as this.
Anywhere Anytime Any place!

I bought my co-worker lunch, (who referred me to them) because they are a buried treasure!!!

You will NEVER find another experience; from scheduling the appointment, to meeting them, to saying goodbye, that you will find as pleasurable as this.

originalText.text: I am a seven year survivor of colorectal cancer thanks to Dr. Haroutiounian's prompt diagnosis. He and his wonderful staff are kind, polite, professional, and exemplary. The offices and procedure room are immaculately clean and sanitary. I urge everyone 50 or older (younger, if there is  history of cancer in your family) to have a colonoscopy done as soon as possible. The procedure is short and painless (45 mins. max). I am alive today thanks to Dr. Haroutiounian and his professional staff. Don't wait!

originalText.text: Excellent doctor and great staff. Totally recommend.

originalText.text: He is the BEST. He takes his time, listens, and is kind. He treats you like a human being and NOT like an insurance claim.
